channel.title: Powa: The start-up that fell to earth
channel.description:
Read this interesting article on the BBC. Everything that could go wrong, went wrong.
And it seems the company was run like most VC companies- *Spend like there's no tomorrow, and who needs a product when we can create Hype!*
I should trademark the above :slight_smile:
http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/technology-35860814

item.title: Powa: The start-up that fell to earth
item.dc:creator: Andy
item.source: Powa: The start-up that fell to earth

BBC News

Powa: The start-up that fell to earth

A British start-up that once boasted of having "trumped" Apple runs out of cash after hiring strippers and paying for premium office space.

Read full topic
